definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Why do you bring your profligate companions here?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼你要把你那些酒肉朋友帶到這裏來呢？

sentences.english: We should be able to  distinguish real friends from purely business-typed ones.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該善於區分真朋友與酒肉朋友。

sentences.english: It'snot easyatall to see through a fair-weather friend.
sentences.chinese: 要看透一個人是酒肉朋友非常難。

sentences.english: We’ll probably act differently around our mother then we would around our drinking buddies.
sentences.chinese: 在老媽旁邊和在酒肉朋友旁邊肯定舉止不同。

sentences.english: There are some fair-weather friends around us, we maybe take care.
sentences.chinese: 在我們周圍有一些酒肉朋友，我們或許要注意一下。
安妮特是他的酒肉朋友。

sentences.english: When in trouble, those fair-weather friends of him always leave him holding the bag.
sentences.chinese: 碰到麻煩時，他的那些酒肉朋友總是棄他而去。

sentences.english: Perhaps, these for years we are the wine and meat friend.
sentences.chinese: 也許，這幾年來我們是酒肉朋友。
